name: Re-Play (TheInkSkeleton)
description:
You're an actress on her way to fame, but your organization only has one play to represent. Will you represent the play enough times to become famous?

CONTROLS

- Left and Right Arrow Keys to move.

-Click to select a dialogue option.

Made by TheInkSkeleton in 5 days for Weekly Game Jam 158 - Replay

(Let's be honest, you only have one play because I ran out of time, but I'll make more in the future)
